keyword: calories in 8 count chick fil a nuggets
title: Calories in 8 Count Chick-fil-A Nuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 8 count chick fil a nuggets, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Breaded, pressure-cooked Chick-fil-A chicken nuggets; standard serving without dipping sauce or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An 8-count serving of Chick-fil-A nuggets provides 250 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 count Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for the breaded version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per 8-count serving.
Yes, only 11 g carbs total, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: How does grilled vs. breaded affect calories in Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: Grilled 8-count has ~130 kcal, 120 less than breaded.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in 8 count Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: Around 640 mg, mostly from breading and seasoning.
